name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (blugamedesign)
description:
A simple dungeon exploration game for the 7DFPS Game Jam. In this dungeon, you will explore 3 challenges based on a specific puzzle type. 

This is my second 3D game, so let me know what you think in the comments!

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

SPACE to Jump

F to Activate Buttons
